block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS -- Placed LHP Tom Martin on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Willie Martinez from Buffalo of the International League. Agreed to terms with INF Corey Smith, LHP Derek Thompson and 1B Sean Swedlow. TEXAS RANGERS -- Signed 3B Edwin Encarnacion, P Keith Stamler, OF Frank Sansonetti and P Ruben Feliciano.

National League HOUSTON ASTROS -- Signed LHP Ralph Hicks, RHP Craig Petulla, RHP Damon Yee, OF Eric Lee and OF Paul Lockhart. NEW YORK METS -- Assigned RHP Bobby J. Jones to Norfolk of the International League. Called up LHP Bobby M. Jones from Norfolk. Signed LHP Michael Cox, LHP Chad Elliott, RHP Chad Bowen, RHP David Byard, SS Anthony Coyne, 1B John Raffo, and 3B Timothy Flannigan.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS -- Placed LHP Tom Martin on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Willie Martinez from Buffalo of the International League. Agreed to terms with INF Corey Smith, LHP Derek Thompson and 1B Sean Swedlow. TEXAS RANGERS -- Signed 3B Edwin Encarnacion, P Keith Stamler, OF Frank Sansonetti and P Ruben Feliciano.

National League HOUSTON ASTROS -- Signed LHP Ralph Hicks, RHP Craig Petulla, RHP Damon Yee, OF Eric Lee and OF Paul Lockhart. NEW YORK METS -- Assigned RHP Bobby J. Jones to Norfolk of the International League. Called up LHP Bobby M. Jones from Norfolk. Signed LHP Michael Cox, LHP Chad Elliott, RHP Chad Bowen, RHP David Byard, SS Anthony Coyne, 1B John Raffo, and 3B Timothy Flannigan.
National Basketball Association TORONTO RAPTORS -- Fired Butch Carter, coach.

National Football League BUFFALO BILLS -- Signed WR Scott Pingel. MIAMI DOLPHINS -- Agreed to terms with G Kevin Donnalley and CB Terrence Shaw on one-year contracts. ST. LOUIS RAMS -- Signed CB Dexter McCleon to a one-year contract and OL Steve Everitt to a two-year contract. Released P Mike O'Neal. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS -- Agreed to terms with T Ben Coleman on a one-year contract. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS -- Signed QB Rick Mirer. TENNESSEE TITANS -- Agreed to terms with Jeff Fisher, coach, on a four-year contract. WASHINGTON REDSKINS -- Signed G Jay Leeuwenburg and DE Nolan Harrison.

National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD -- Signed D Nick Naumenko. PHOENIX COYOTES -- Announced RW Mikael Renberg has agreed to terms on a five-year contract with Lulea of the Swedish Elite League.EDSKINS -- Signed G Jay Leeuwenburg and DE Nolan Harrison.
